title: Microbiological evaluation of ultraviolet C light-emitting diodes for disinfection of medical instruments

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Hannah Siwe, Annelies Aerssens, Mieke V. Flour, Silke Ternest, Leen Van Simaey, Duncan Verstraeten, Alain F. Kalmar, Isabel Leroux-Roels, Philip Meuleman, Piet Cools
